author: Jason Gay
title: Ballad of the Renegade Hockey Licker
text:
The mature, responsible sports columnist within me—he exists, I swear, somewhere—knows that the proper subject for today’s column is the NBA, especially the thrills of the surprising Boston-Philadelphia and LeBron-Toronto series.
But I don’t want to be responsible right now. So boring!
I want to talk about the licking. The licking controversy...
